name: WGBEasyMenu
summary: A lightweight iOS context menu library with preview support and rich styling options.
description:
EasyMenu is a lightweight wrapper around UIMenu and UIContextMenuInteraction that provides an extremely simple and easy-to-integrate context menu solution for any UIView. 

Features:
• Simple declarative API using EasyMenuConfig and EasyMenuItem
• Preview functionality with long-press preview and force-touch navigation
• Rich menu styling with state control (selected/disabled/destructive)
• Support for both static and dynamic menus
• Automatic lifecycle management
• Nested submenu support
• Built-in iOS version compatibility checking
• Convenience extensions for UIButton and UITableView
